name: theyesornogame
0:
”Alexa play the yes or no game”
”Alexa open the yes or no game”
”Alexa start the yes or no game”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the yes or no game
des:
Answer the questions without saying yes or no! Are you ready to play? 
Did you say yes? 
Be careful in your answers, there are some trick questions. 
Good luck!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
